enrolled-dateline.#text: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Friday, the third day of January, two thousand and fourteen

congress.#text: One Hundred Thirteenth Congress of the United States of America

official-title.#text: To amend title 49, United States Code, to provide for limitations on the fees charged to passengers of air carriers.

role.#text: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.

header.#text: Limitation on fees charged to passengers of air carriers

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , is amended to read as follows:

text.#text: Fees imposed under subsection (a)(1) shall be $5.60 per one-way trip in air transportation or intrastate air transportation that originates at an airport in the United States, except that the fee imposed per round trip shall not exceed $11.20.

quote.#tail: means a trip on an air travel itinerary that terminates or has a stopover at the origin point (or co-terminal).

text.#text: The amendment made by subsection (a) shall apply with respect to a trip in air transportation or intrastate air transportation that is purchased on or after the date of the enactment of this Act.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: HR 5462 ENR: To amend title 49, United States Code, to provide for limitations on the fees charged to passengers of air carriers.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}rights.#text: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
